name: Food & Nutrition
description: Free & low cost meal plans organized by diet, cultural specifications and populations served.

name: Shelter
description: Temporary and emergency shelter for vulnerable populations across YVR mainland.

name: Mental Health & Wellbeing
description: Low-cost, free or sliding-scale service providers and organizations organized by cultural competency, languages spoken and other customizeable filters.

name: Low Cost Dentistry
description: Dental providers in YVR providing low-cost or sliding-scale dentistry to community members in need

name: Cultural Centres & Peer Support
description: Culturally-appropriate peer support offered by independent cultural centres in YVR.

name: Gender-Based Violence Support
description: Sliding scale or free services to support survivors of gender-based violence.

name: Community Gardens
description: Seasonal, indoor and outdoor community gardens available to all members of the public.
